AD.name: Ecore File Name
AD.description: The name of the ecore file. No .ecore extension is required

AD.name: Ecore Package Name
AD.description: The name of the package in the ecore file

AD.name: Ecore URI
AD.description: The URI of the package in the ecore file

AD.name: Ecore NS Prefix
AD.description: The XML prefix of the package in the ecore file

AD.name: Genmodel Prefix
AD.description: The prefix used for generated Code. E.g. if the prefix is TeSt the Factory will be namend TeStFactory
